DOC.detailed_description: Observational study show fish consumption associate low risk cardiovascular disease , clinical trial demonstrate fish oil nutritional supplementation associate improvement cardiometabolic risk factor profile include fast triglyceride blood pressure . However , mechanisms action fish oil well understood . Specifically , effect different composition term ratio fatty acid EPA DHA know . We propose pilot feasibility study fish oil nutritional supplementation 40 healthy adult participant two different commercially available fish oil ( high EPA/DHA ratio , high DHA/EPA ratio , sample 20 per group ) hypothesis 4 week supplementation fish oil result differential change platelet function , blood pressure fast triglyceride level . We also bank blood urine future mechanistic study . This pilot study allow u collect preliminary data definitive mechanistic study effect fish oil supplementation demonstrate feasibility protocol .
